pathAssistantSteps.info: Collaborate with Alliances and please make sure all documents are attached to this deal.
Provide Reasons why this Deal didn't come to an agreement. Anything we can do better next time? Add to the comments.

Tasks to complete :

  • Source Deal Team
  • Sign and upload finalized Concept/Term Sheet
  • Manage Sanction Contracting Approval

Tasks to complete :

  • Sign and upload CDA
  • Gather and upload Confidential Data
  • Capture feedback from stakeholders
  • Gain agreement to move forward to Due Diligence

The aim of the due diligence stage is to ensure that any decision taken regarding the company in question is an informed one, maximizing your chances of adding value in partnering transaction.


Tasks to complete :

  • Source Due Diligence Team
  • Create and upload DD deliverables
  • Manage Material Transfer Agreement
  • Manage 3rd Party review
  • Approve to move forward with Concept/Term Sheet
  • Manage Feasibility Study Agreement
Identification is completed when a decision is made to move forward with a Confidential Assessment. The Opportunity will be assigned to a Business Development Project Lead.

Tasks to complete :

  • Create/Approve final contract
  • Sign and upload final Contract
Risk Assessment Team will take over and complete all necessary steps. Please provide all information your risk assessment colleagues need to progress.
